alert.note: Alert for Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 14 at 1:10PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Nueces County, including Corpus Christi. * WHEN...Until 415 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 109 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Corpus Christi, Texas A&M University Corpus Christi, Bay Area Medical Center, La Palmera Mall, Flour Bluff, Spohn Hospital South, Driscoll Childrens Hospital, Corpus Christi Country Club, Waldron Field, Cole Park, Del Mar College Heritage Campus, Downtown Corpus Christi, Cabaniss Field, Corpus Christi North Beach, Mustang Island State Park, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Packery Channel, Padre Balli Park and Corpus Christi Naval Air Station. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
